definition: accord/to make contact/to agree/to consult with/extensive
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: The investment-inviting delegation has attracted many busi-nesspeople from Southeast Asia to Singapore to hold talks on various projects.
sentences.chinese: 招商代表團吸引了很多東南亞客商來新加坡洽商項目。

sentences.english: The Church Board shall consult all Ministry Committees regarding the recommended candidate.
sentences.chinese: 教會執事會必須與所有堂務委員會洽商經推薦的人選。

sentences.english: The company is in discussions with the FDA regarding clinical trials.
sentences.chinese: 公司與美國藥管局正在進行有關臨牀試驗的洽商。

sentences.english: I'm glad our negotiation has come to a successful conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興此次洽商圓滿告成。

definition: to consult/to discuss seriously/to negotiate/to confer/negotiations/consultations
to reach a verdict/to conclude a judgment
to win a bid/to win a trophy in a contest/(jokingly) to get an STD
to act prudently/steering a cautious course
to decide (in a meeting)/to resolve (i.e. pass a resolution)
